perturbation.original_text: Within fifteen (15) Business Days after the end of each month during the Term, each Party shall provide to the other Party a written report setting forth (i) the number of Details completed during such month and (ii) any changes to Incentive Compensation or selling position of the Product by Sales Representatives during such month. Exact shall provide to Pfizer a weekly report detailing, on an Eligible Prescriber-by-Eligible Prescriber basis, the Product Laboratory Services activity, including but not limited to, the number of orders received, number of shipments sent to patients, and number of results sent back to prescriber.
perturbation.changed_text: Within fifteen (15) Business Days after the end of each month during the Term, each Party shall provide to the other Party a written report setting forth (i) the number of Details completed during such month and (ii) any changes to Incentive Compensation or selling position of the Product by Sales Representatives during such month. Exact shall provide to Pfizer a bi-weekly report detailing, on an Eligible Prescriber-by-Eligible Prescriber basis, the Product Laboratory Services activity, including but not limited to, the number of orders received, number of shipments sent to patients, and number of results sent back to prescriber.
perturbation.explanation: The original contract states that Exact provides a 'weekly report' to Pfizer. This change modifies that section to now state that Exact provides a 'bi-weekly report' to Pfizer. This creates an in-text contradiction on the frequency of reporting, creating uncertainty and enforceability issues.

perturbation.original_text: Exact, within thirty (30) days after the end of each Calendar Quarter of the Term, shall deliver to Pfizer a consolidated report in the form of and containing the information necessary to confirm the calculation of the Promotion Fee for such Calendar Quarter, together with the underlying spreadsheets with respect to such Calendar Quarter. The Promotion Fee due with respect to such Calendar Quarter and reflected on the consolidated report shall be remitted at the time such report is made.
perturbation.changed_text: Exact, within forty-five (45) days after the end of each Calendar Quarter of the Term, shall deliver to Pfizer a consolidated report in the form of and containing the information necessary to confirm the calculation of the Promotion Fee for such Calendar Quarter, together with the underlying spreadsheets with respect to such Calendar Quarter. The Promotion Fee due with respect to such Calendar Quarter and reflected on the consolidated report shall be remitted at the time such report is made.
perturbation.explanation: The original contract states that Exact delivers to Pfizer, 'within thirty (30) days' after each calendar quarter the report with Promotion Fee. This change modifies that section to now state that Exact delivers the report with Promotion Fee, 'within forty-five (45) days'. This creates an in-text contradiction on the report due date, creating uncertainty and enforceability issues.

perturbation.original_text: Any amounts due under Sections 4.2(c)(i) and (ii) shall be payable within thirty (30) days after each of June 30 , and December 31  of each Calendar Year, beginning with June 30, 2019, as applicable.
perturbation.changed_text: Any amounts due under Sections 4.2(c)(i) and (ii) shall be payable within forty-five (45) days after each of June 30 , and December 31  of each Calendar Year, beginning with June 30, 2019, as applicable.
perturbation.explanation: The original contract states that amounts due to be payable, 'within thirty (30) days' after June 30 and December 31. This change modifies that section to now state that amounts are due to be payable, 'within forty-five (45) days'. This creates an in-text contradiction on the payment due date, creating uncertainty and enforceability issues.
